title: Paywall Displays - Images/Buttons present
custom_steps:
@SmokeiOS @reinstall
  Scenario: Paywall Displays - Images/Buttons present
    Given I am in "iOS" app homePage
    And Wait for "2" sec
    Then I Verify "Subscriber Login" text appears
    And I Verify "Subscription Features" text appears
    And I Verify "Go to Lite" text appears
    And I Verify "Restore" text appears
    And I Verify "Monthly" text appears
    And I Verify "Yearly" text appears
    And I Verify "You will automatically be billed (subscription price) immediately following the free trial period" text appears
    And I Verify "Subscribe to At Bat Premium to follow your team live with audio, in-game highlights and more." text appears
    And I Verify "The Best Way to Watch and Listen to Live Baseball." text appears

title: Login Page Displays
custom_steps:
@SmokeiOS  
Scenario: Login Page Displays
    Given I am in "iOS" app homePage
    Then Wait for "2" sec
    Then Tap on "Subscriber Login" button
    And Wait for "2" sec
    Then I Verify "Log in with your MLB.com account" text appears
    And I Verify "Privacy Policy" text appears
    And I Verify "Log In" text appears
    And I Verify "Cancel" text appears
    And I Verify "Forgot Password?" text appears

title: Paid user can log in
custom_steps:
@SmokeiOS @reinstall
  Scenario: Paid user can log in
    Given I am in "iOS" app homePage
    And Wait for "2" sec
    Then Tap on "Subscriber Login" button
    And Wait for "2" sec
    Then I Verify "Log In" text appears
    And I login with "ValidUser" to the app
    And Tap on "Log In" button
    And Wait for "2" sec
    And I "Accept" Alert button if exists
    Then I Verify "Favorite Teams" text appears
    And I Verify "Done" text appears

title: User can select Favorite Team
custom_steps:
@SmokeiOS 
Scenario: User can select Favorite Team
    Given I am in "iOS" app homePage
    And Wait for "2" sec
    Then Tap on "Subscriber Login" button
    And Wait for "2" sec
    Then I Verify "Log In" text appears
    And I login with "ValidUser" to the app
    And Tap on "Log In" button
    And Wait for "2" sec
    And I "Accept" Alert button if exists
    Then I Verify "Favorite Teams" text appears
    And I Verify "Done" text appears
    And Wait for "2" sec
    And Tap "+" for "Team1"
    Then Verify "-" for "Team1"
    And Tap on "Done" button
    And Wait for "2" sec

title: User can enable Notifications
custom_steps:
@SmokeiOS
  Scenario: User can enable Notifications
    Given I am in "iOS" app homePage
    Then Wait for "2" sec
    And Perform Login if "Subscriber Login" appears
    Then Wait for "2" sec
    Then I "Accept" Alert button if exists
    And Perform Favourite Team Selection if "Favorite Teams" appears
    And Wait for "2" sec
    Then Tap on "Team DropDown" if "Tap the team name to change teams." exists
    Then Tap on "Team DropDown" if "Tap the team name to change teams." exists
    Then I Verify "MLB.TV" text appears
    Then I Verify "Ask At Bat" text appears
    Then I Verify "Gameday audio" text appears

title: Switching Teams
custom_steps:
@SmokeiOS
  Scenario: Switching Teams
    Given I am in "iOS" app homePage
    Then Wait for "10" sec
    Then I "Accept" Alert button if exists
    Then I Verify "MLB.TV" text appears
    Then Tap on "Team DropDown" button
    Then Tap on "Team DropDown" button if exists
    Then I Verify "Teams" text appears
    Then Tap on "Baltimore Orioles" button
    Then I Verify "Teams" disappears
    Then I Verify "MLB.TV" text appears
    Then I Verify "Ask At Bat" text appears
    Then I Verify "Gameday audio" text appears
    Then I Verify "Orioles" appears

title: Team Schedule Calendar Loads
custom_steps:
@SmokeiOS
  Scenario: Team Schedule Calendar Loads
    Given I am in "iOS" app homePage
    Then Wait for "2" sec
    Then I "Accept" Alert button if exists
    Then I Verify "Team DropDown" appears
    Then Scroll to "Schedule" button
    Then Tap on "Schedule" button
    Then Tap on "Calendar" button
    Then I Verify "List" appears
    Then I Verify "Back Button" appears

title: Team Schedule List Loads
custom_steps:
@SmokeiOS
  Scenario: Team Schedule List Loads
    Given I am in "iOS" app homePage
    Then Wait for "2" sec
    Then I "Accept" Alert button if exists
    Then Scroll to "Schedule" button
    Then Tap on "Schedule" button
    Then Tap on "Calendar" button
    Then I Verify "Home" appears
    Then I Verify "Away" appears
    Then I Verify "Download" appears
    Then Tap on "List" button
    Then I Verify "Calendar" appears
    # Then I Verify "Download" appears
    # Then I Verify "Home" disappears
    # Then I Verify "Away" disappears
    Then Tap on "Back Button" button

custom_steps:

    Then I Verify "Team DropDown" appears
    Then Tap on "See All Top Stories" button 
    Then I Verify "News Images" appears
    Then Tap on "Back Button" button
    Then I Verify "Team DropDown" appears

title: MLB.TV EPG Loads
custom_steps:
@SmokeiOS
  Scenario: MLB.TV EPG Loads

    Then I Verify "Team DropDown" appears
    Then Tap on "MLB.TV" button 
    Then I Verify ".TV" appears
    Then I Verify "Classics" appears
    Then I Verify "Previous Day" appears
    Then I Verify "Next Day" appears
    Then Tap on "Close" button
    Then I Verify "Team DropDown" appears

title: Gameday Audio Controller Loads
custom_steps:
@SmokeiOS

    Then I Verify "Gameday Audio" appears
    Then I Verify "Help" appears
    Then I Verify "Play Gameday Audio" appears

title: Scoreboard Loads
custom_steps:
@SmokeiOS
  Scenario: Scoreboard Loads

    Then Tap on "Red Sox" button
    Then I Verify "Team DropDown" appears
    Then Tap on "Scores" button 
    Then I Verify "Data Cell" appears
    Then I Verify "Previous Day" appears
    Then I Verify "Next Day" appears

title: Date Picker Loads
custom_steps:
@SmokeiOS
  Scenario: Date Picker Loads
    Given I am in "iOS" app homePage
    Then Wait for "2" sec
    Then Tap on "Red Sox" button
    Then I Verify "Team DropDown" appears
    Then Tap on "Scores" button 
    Then Tap on "DateTime Picker" button
    Then I Verify "Today" appears
    Then I Verify "CalendarPrevDay" appears

title: News Tab Loads
custom_steps:
@SmokeiOS
  Scenario: News Tab Loads
    Given I am in "iOS" app homePage
    Then Wait for "2" sec
    Then Tap on "Red Sox" button
    Then I Verify "Team DropDown" appears
    Then Tap on "Scores" button 
    Then I Verify "Data Cell" appears
    Then Tap on "News Tab" button
    Then Wait for "2" sec
    Then I Verify "News Top Stories" appears
    Then I Verify "News Videos" appears
    Then I Verify "MLB.com" appears
    Then I Verify "Down Arrow Navigation Bar" appears

title: Article Loads
custom_steps:
@SmokeiOS
  Scenario: Article Loads
    Given I am in "iOS" app homePage
    Then Wait for "2" sec
    Then Tap on "Red Sox" button
    Then I Verify "Team DropDown" appears
    Then Tap on "News Tab" button
    Then I Verify "News Top Stories" appears
    Then I Get text for "First News Article Text" and store it in "var_title"
    Then Tap on "First News Article Text" button
    Then I Verify "var_title" appears
    Then I Verify "Adjust Text Size" appears
    Then I Verify "Share" appears
    Then Tap on "Back Button" button
    Then I Verify "News Top Stories" appears
    Then I Verify "News Videos" appears

custom_steps:

    Then I Verify "Team DropDown" appears
    Then Tap on "News Tab" button
    Then I Verify "News Top Stories" appears
    Then Tap on "Down Arrow Navigation Bar" button
    Then Tap on "Baltimore Orioles" button
    Then I Verify "News Top Stories" appears
    Then I Verify "News Videos" appears
    Then I Verify "Orioles" appears
    Then I Verify "Down Arrow Navigation Bar" appears

    Then Tap on "News Videos" button
